ctu.nengoros.comm.rosutils

Class ProcessLauncher

  • java.lang.Object
    • ctu.nengoros.comm.rosutils.ProcessLauncher

  • public class ProcessLauncher
extends java.lang.Object
    Factory which is able to launch native processes. TODO: change this to its own thread which is subscribed to both streams.
